title: Want to buy or trade for James Tyng
author: bgar3

posts.post_title: Want to buy or trade for James Tyng
posts.post_content:
If anyone has a James Tyng vintage photo, cdv, cabinet, team photo etc they would sell and/or trade, I would probably be interested.  
Thank you. 
[url]bgar3@verizon.net[/url]

The Old Judge cards are few and far between, a golden opportunity not long ago in Heritage for a trimmed OJ.  Good luck.

[url]https://sports.ha.com/itm/baseball/1887-90-n172-old-judge-jim-tyng-469-3-sgc-authentic/a/152139-44011.s?ic4=GalleryView-ShortDescription-071515[/url]

Thank you Joe.
At this point, not at that time, I would get an Old Judge, but I am hoping for a cdv or cabinet to go with a couple other images and letters I have.  
You are correct, looking back, I should have tried for that one.  
Bruce
The image on that trimmed Tyng OJ was nice.  I almost bit on it, but I just couldn't get past that missing piece at the bottom.
If anyone has one, my standards are not as high as Fred’s.  I do not grade, care only about the image quality and don’t really care much about the mount or back.

Hey Bud,

I won the Heritage card and ended up selling a bit later on ebay. PM me and I'll pass along the buyers ebay link. Maybe you can reach out to them and try to make a deal.
Thank you.  I would like to make contact.  Appreciate your help but no luck locating him on eBay..  I am just a little too late on this one I quess.
